ðŸ“– Summary: Cybersecurity AI (CAI) is an open-source Python framework designed to empower security professionals in building and deploying AI-powered offensive and defensive automation. It provides building blocks for creating specialized AI agents that assist with mitigation, vulnerability discovery, exploitation, and security assessment. It supports various AI models and built-in security tools.
